title: No, Madhya Pradesh CM Shivraj Singh Chouhan Did Not Consume Meat
subtitle: A viral image on social media falsely showed Madhya Pradesh CM Shivraj Singh Chouhan consuming meat
author: www.thequint.com
vclaim:
According to the report, CM Shivraj Singh Chouhan carries home-cooked food and manages to rest by taking short naps inside the chopper that flies him from one place to another in the grueling election season. The image in The Tribune article shows him having his lunch in one such helicopter ride.

Social media users should be circumspect about images that are used for political propaganda in the run up to the elections. In the past, a photoshopped image of Karnataka Congress MLA Sowmya Reddy eating meat was circulated in run up to Karnataka by-polls, while she also claims to be vegetarian.
